Enabling online mode will only allow players logged in with valid Microsoft/Mojang accounts to join the LAN server.
Disabling online mode will allow anyone to join the LAN server.

This mode will allow anyone to join the LAN server while retaining the UUID for those who logged in with their Microsoft/Mojang accounts. Use this mode if you are migrating from the online mode and want to retain the inventories.
lanserverproperties.options.preference_e: Automatically load the settings from the stored preference, if the server is not published. Otherwise, this window displays the current configuration of the server.
lanserverproperties.gui.always_offline.m: A list of space-separated player names that are always considered offline. Only valid in the 'Offline Mode + UUID Fix' mode and can be helpful to resolve the name collision between an offline player and a registered online player.
